name: Sushi Corner
caption: The Best Sushi
review: This place is owned my Mom and Dad.  And, this is their life.  It's the best!

name: Cappa's Trackside Kitchen
caption: Piles of Food
review: When I am hungry, I go there.  I can never finish my plate. Small place, but the people there are friendly, and awesome.

name: Mexico Lindo
caption: Good, Authentic Mexican food
review: So real the servers barely speak english.
